name: Sobada Ayurveda Dasa Panguwa
description: Used to treat headaches, sneezing, runny nose, body aches, coughs, colds and fever. Boil the contents with 3 cups of water for 15 minutes and drink it after straining. For Adults : take in 2 divided doses, Children : take in 3 divided doses for a day. Use for several days as required. Add sugar if necessary. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
